{{velocity}} ####################################################### ## This displayer is created in order to be used as ## base or example to create new displayer. ####################################################### ## Use css and javascript in object of the displayer ## $xwiki.ssx.use('DisplayerCode.TotemDisplayerModel') ## $xwiki.jsx.use('DisplayerCode.TotemDisplayerModel') ####################################################### ## The setDataMap Macro is used to put in a Map the ## datas from $document following parameters given ## by the user throught $blockDisplayerDocClass and ## $blockDisplayerFields #macro(setDataMap $document $blockDisplayerDocClass $blockDisplayerFields) #set($dataMap = {}) #set($object = $document.getObject("${blockDisplayerDocClass}")) ## set Title #if("$!{object.get('title')}" != "") #set($discard = $dataMap.put("title", "$!{object.get('title')}")) #else #set($discard = $dataMap.put("title", "$!{document.getTitle()}")) #end ## set other #foreach($blockDisplayerFieldEntry in $!{blockDisplayerFields.entrySet()}) #set($fieldName = "$!{blockDisplayerFieldEntry.value}") #if("$!{object.get($fieldName)}" != "") #set($discard = $dataMap.put("$!{blockDisplayerFieldEntry.key}", "$!{object.get($fieldName)}")) #else #set($discard = $dataMap.put("$!{blockDisplayerFieldEntry.key}", "")) #end #end #end ####################################################### ## And here start the specific code for the displayer {{html wiki="true"}} {{info}}This Displayer is made an example of use{{/info}} ## Parse all the document given by $blockDisplayerDocList. ## We advise to implement a limit of document that can be displayed. #foreach($document in $blockDisplayerDocList) ## Setup the map of data to use it as $dataMap.attribute #setDataMap($document $blockDisplayerDocClass $blockDisplayerFields) ## Then display information
Title : $dataMap.title
Date : $dataMap.date
Description : $dataMap.description
Url : $dataMap.url
Image : $dataMap.image
#end {{/html}} {{/velocity}}
